2 ^ Domine: 3 ^ Quoniam sagittae tuae infīxae sunt mihi
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et confirmāvistī super mē manum tuam. ^ For thy arrows are fastened in me
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: and thy hand hath been strong upon me.

2 ^ Domine: 4 ^ Nōn est sānitās in carne meā
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: ā faciē īrae tuae; nōn est pāx ossibus meīs ā faciē peccātōrum meōrum. ^ There is no health in my flesh
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: because of thy wrath; there is no peace for my bones

2 ^ Domine: 5 ^ Quoniam inīquitātēs meae supergressae sunt caput meum
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et sīcut onus grave gravātae sunt super mē. ^ For my iniquities are gone over my head
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: and as a heavy burden are become heavy upon me.

2 ^ Domine: 6 ^ Putruērunt et corruptae sunt cicātrīcēs meae
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: ā faciē insapientiae meae. ^ My sores are putrefied and corrupted

2 ^ Domine: 7 ^ Miser factus sum et curvātus sum usque in fīnem; tōtā diē contrīstātus ingrediēbar. ^ I am become miserable
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: and am bowed down even to the end; I walked sorrowful all the day long.

2 ^ Domine: 8 ^ Quoniam lumbī meī implētī sunt illūsiōnibus
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et nōn est sānitās in carne meā. ^ For my loins are filled with illusions; and there is no health in my flesh.

2 ^ Domine: 9 ^ Afflictus sum
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et humiliātus sum nimis; rugiēbam ā gemitū cordis meī. ^ I am afflicted and humbled exceedingly; I roared with the groaning of my heart.

2 ^ Domine: 10 ^ Domine
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: ante tē omne dēsīderium meum
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: et gemitus meus ā tē nōn est absconditus. ^ Lord
O Lord: all my desire is before thee
in thy indignation; nor chastise me in: and my groaning is not hidden from thee.

2 ^ Domine: 11 ^ Cor meum conturbātum est; dērelīquit mē virtūs mea
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et lūmen oculōrum meōrum
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: et ipsum nōn est mēcum. ^ My heart is troubled
in thy indignation; nor chastise me in: and the light of my eyes itself is not with me.

2 ^ Domine: 12 ^ Amīcī meī et proximī meī adversum mē appropinquāvērunt et stetērunt
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et quī jūxtā mē erant
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: dē longē stetērunt. ^ My friends and my neighbours have drawn near and stood against me
O Lord: and they that were near me stood afar off.

2 ^ Domine: 13 ^ Et vim faciēbant quī quaerēbant animam meam
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et quī inquīrēbant mala mihi
O Lord: et dolōs tōtā diē meditābantur. ^ And they that sought my soul used violence
in thy indignation; nor chastise me in: and they that sought evils to me
column7: and studied deceits all the day long.

2 ^ Domine: 14 ^ Egō autem
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: tamquam surdus
O Lord: et sīcut mūtus nōn aperiens ōs suum. ^ But I
column7: and as a dumb man not opening his mouth.

2 ^ Domine: 15 ^ Et factus sum sīcut homō nōn audiens
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et nōn habens in ōre suō redargūtiōnēs. ^ And I became as a man that heareth not
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: and that hath no reproofs in his mouth.

2 ^ Domine: 16 ^ Quoniam in tē Domine spērāvī; tū exaudiēs mē Domine Deus meus. ^ For in thee
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: O Lord
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: have I hoped; thou wilt hear me

2 ^ Domine: 17 ^ Quia dīxī: Nēquandō supergaudeant mihi inimīcī meī. Et dum commoventur pedēs meī
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: super mē magna locūtī sunt. ^ For I said: Lest at any time my enemies rejoice over me. And whilst my feet are moved
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: they speak great things against me.

2 ^ Domine: 18 ^ Quoniam egō in flagella parātus sum
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et dolor meus in conspectū meō semper. ^ For I am ready for scourges
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: and my sorrow is continually before me.

2 ^ Domine: 19 ^ Quoniam inīquitātem meam adnuntiābō
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et cōgitābō prō peccātō meō. ^ For I will declare my iniquity
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: and I will think for my sin.

2 ^ Domine: 20 ^ Inimīcī autem meī vīvunt
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: et confirmātī sunt super mē
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: et multiplicātī sunt quī ōdērunt mē inīquē. ^ But my enemies live
in thy indignation; nor chastise me in: and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied.

2 ^ Domine: 21 ^ Quī retribuunt mala prō bonīs
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: dētrahēbant mihi
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: quoniam sequēbar bonitātem. ^ They that render evil for good

2 ^ Domine: 22 ^ Nē dērelinquās mē
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: Domine Deus meus; nē discesserīs ā mē. ^ For sake me not
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: O Lord my God; do not thou depart from me.

2 ^ Domine: 23 ^ Intende in adjūtōrium meum
nē in furōre tuō arguās mē: Domine
neque in īrā tuā corripiās mē. ^ Rebuke: Deus salūtis meae. ^ Attend unto my help
